description: Try our easy to follow Hawaiian Pork Kebabs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,BBQ,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Hawaiian Pork Kebabs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Soak 8 bamboo skewers in water for 20 minutes before preparing food.
Place diced pork into a bowl and season with cumin, salt and pepper. Stir well to combine.
Drain pineapple pieces and place juice into a small pan with brown sugar and chilli. Bring to the boil and simmer until syrupy. Remove from heat and refrigerate until needed.
Preheat a BBQ to medium-high. Thread pork pieces, capsicum and pineapple pieces onto the skewers. Leftover pineapple pieces can be chopped and added to the dressing.
Spray kebabs with oil and BBQ for 6-8 minutes, turning until browned on all sides and cooked through. Add onion and mint to dressing. Serve kebabs with rice and spoon over the dressing.
